commands.name: setjoin
commands.description: Sets the join channel, uses the default channel if not set

commands.name: setlog
commands.description: Sets the logging channel, uses the default channel if not set

commands.name: setsuggestion
commands.description: Sets the suggestion channel, uses the default channel if not set

commands.name: setup
commands.description: Sets up the bot for moderation like adding the muted roles and overriding channel permissions

commands.name: echo
commands.description: Echos a message into another channel, the message to echo cannot contain mentions
commands.example: echo #testing Hi, this is a test!

commands.name: nuke
commands.description: Nukes a certain number of messages, from 0 up to 99

commands.name: mute
commands.description: Mutes a user for a specified period of time, defaulted to minutes

commands.name: setpermission
commands.description: Sets the permission of a command to be available to a role and higher

commands.name: setpermissioncategory
commands.description: Sets the permission of all commands in a category to be available to the same role and higher

commands.name: viewpermissions
commands.description: Views all the permissions set in the server

commands.name: commands
commands.description: Displays all the commands available to the user

commands.name: help
commands.description: Displays a help card for the user to learn more about a specific command

commands.name: invite
commands.description: Displays all invite links related to me such as my development server and to invite me to your server

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Displays the ping for me

commands.name: serverinfo
commands.description: Displays information about the server

commands.name: source
commands.description: Displays all links related to my source code

commands.name: assign
commands.description: Assigns a role to the specified user, the role must not be higher than my role

commands.name: getjoinrole
commands.description: Displays the join role that will be assigned to new members on join in the server

commands.name: roles
commands.description: Displays all roles and their IDs in the server

commands.name: setjoinrole
commands.description: Sets the join role that will be assigned to new members on join in the server

commands.name: clearjoinrole
commands.description: Clears the join role

commands.name: unassign
commands.description: Removes a role from the user, the role must not be higher than my role
